REM **********
REM THE LAWN MOWER GAME 1.0
REM BY TIMO KLOSS
REM
REM TILES AND PICTURES CREATED WITH LOWRES PAINT 4.1.
REM SPRITES CREATED WITH SPRITE DESIGNER 2.1.
REM MAPS CREATED WITH TILE MAP EDITOR 2.
REM **********

PERSIST HISCORE

NUMMAPS=5

DIM MAPS(NUMMAPS,7,7),MAP(7,7),ANIMALS(8)

DIM SNGARR(15,2),SNGCHA(63,15,1),SNGPHR(63,15,1),SNGPLAYER(2,1)

SNGFIRSTINST=10
GOSUB INITINSTRUMENTS

REM SFX
DEF SOUND 0, 2, 0.3
DEF SOUND LINE 0, 0.4, 24, 0.4
DEF SOUND 1, 2, 0.3
DEF SOUND LINE 1, 0.2, 24, 0.4
DEF SOUND 2,0,0.5,0.05
DEF SOUND 3,3,0.5,0.02

RESTORE TILES
GOSUB SHOWIMAGE
GET 0,0 TO 63,63

RESTORE SPRITES
DIM ARR(15)
FOR I=0 TO 27
  FOR J=0 TO 15
    READ ARR(J)
  NEXT J
  READ A,B,C,D
  DEF SPRITE I,ARR,B,C,D
NEXT I

RESTORE MAPS
FOR I=1 TO NUMMAPS
  READ MW,MH
  FOR X=0 TO MW-1
    FOR Y=0 TO MH-1
      READ MAPS(I,X,Y)
    NEXT Y
  NEXT X
NEXT I

GAMESTART:
LIVES=3
SCORE=0
NUMANIMALS=2
LEVEL=1
CURMAP=1

GAMEPAD 0
SOUND OFF

RESTORE TITLEPIC
GOSUB SHOWIMAGE

SNGMAXVOICE=2
RESTORE TITLEMUSIC
GOSUB READSONG
GOSUB UPDATESONG

LAYER 1
COLOR 1
BL=TRUE
REPEAT
  IF BL THEN TEXT 31,58,"START",1 ELSE CLS
  BL=NOT BL
  GOSUB UPDATESONG
  WAIT 0.15 TAP
UNTIL BUTTON(0)
CLS
LAYER 0

LEVELSTART:
SPRITE OFF
SOUND OFF

LAYER 1
CLS
LAYER 0
CLS
T$="LEVEL "+LEVEL
COLOR 10
TEXT 31,28,T$,1
TEXT 31,30,T$,1
TEXT 30,29,T$,1
TEXT 32,29,T$,1
COLOR 9
TEXT 31,29,T$,1
WAIT 2 TAP

GOSUB DRAWMAP
GOSUB INITPLAYER
GOSUB INITANIMALS

GAMEPAD 1

PLMOVE=0
ANMOVE=0
ANCOUNT=0
TIME=60
SHIELD=60
GOSUB HUD

LAYER 1
COLOR 1
BAR 59,0 TO 63,6
COLOR 4
TEXT 62,1,LIVES,2
LAYER 0

SNOFF=0

REPEAT
  OLDTIME=INT(TIME)
  
  IF PLMOVE=0 THEN
    PLANIM=0
    TMX=INT(PLX/8)
    TMY=INT(PLY/8)
    IF UP(0) AND TMY>0 THEN
      IF MAP(TMX,TMY-1)<10 THEN
        PLDIR=0
        PLMOVE=1
      END IF
    ELSE IF DOWN(0) AND TMY<7 THEN
      IF MAP(TMX,TMY+1)<10 THEN
        PLDIR=2
        PLMOVE=1
      END IF
    ELSE IF LEFT(0) AND TMX>0 THEN
      IF MAP(TMX-1,TMY)<10 THEN
        PLDIR=3
        PLMOVE=1
      END IF
    ELSE IF RIGHT(0) AND TMX<7 THEN
      IF MAP(TMX+1,TMY)<10 THEN
        PLDIR=1
        PLMOVE=1
      END IF
    END IF
    IF PLMOVE=0 THEN SNOFF=0
  END IF
  
  IF PLMOVE>0 THEN
    IF PLMOVE=1 THEN
      SOUND 0,40+SNOFF,3,2
      SOUND 0,20+SNOFF,3,2
      SOUND 0,30+SNOFF,3,2
      IF SNOFF<30 THEN SNOFF=SNOFF+1
    END IF
    PLMOVE=PLMOVE+1
    PLANIM=(PLMOVE MOD 2)+1
    IF PLDIR=0 THEN PLY=PLY-1
    IF PLDIR=1 THEN PLX=PLX+1
    IF PLDIR=2 THEN PLY=PLY+1
    IF PLDIR=3 THEN PLX=PLX-1
    IF PLMOVE=9 THEN
      PLMOVE=0
      TMX=INT(PLX/8)
      TMY=INT(PLY/8)
      TN=MAP(TMX,TMY)
      IF TN=0 OR TN=3 OR TN=5 OR TN=7 THEN
        IF TN=0 THEN
          MISSING=MISSING-1
        ELSE IF TN=3 THEN
          TIME=TIME-4
          SOUND 2, 60, 8, 0
        ELSE IF TN=5 THEN
          TIME=TIME-6
          SOUND 2, 64, 10, 0
        ELSE IF TN=7 THEN
          TIME=TIME-8
          SOUND 2, 68, 12, 0
        END IF
        TN=TN+1
        GOSUB DRAWTILE
      END IF
      IF ANMOVE=0 THEN GOSUB MOVEANIMALS
    END IF
  END IF
  IF SHIELD MOD 3<2 THEN
    SPRITE 0,PLX,PLY,PLDIR
    SPRITE 1,PLX,PLY,4+PLDIR*3+PLANIM
  ELSE
    SPRITE OFF 0
    SPRITE OFF 1
  END IF
  
  IF ANMOVE>0 THEN
    ANMOVE=ANMOVE+1
    FOR I=0 TO NUMANIMALS-1
      X=SPRITE X(2+I)
      Y=SPRITE Y(2+I)
      D=ANIMALS(I)
      IF D<4 THEN
        IF D=0 THEN Y=Y-1
        IF D=1 THEN X=X+1
        IF D=2 THEN Y=Y+1
        IF D=3 THEN X=X-1
        IF ANMOVE=9 THEN F=0 ELSE F=1+(ANMOVE MOD 2)
        SPRITE 2+I,X,Y,16+D*3+F
      END IF
    NEXT I
    IF ANMOVE=9 THEN ANMOVE=0
  ELSE
    ANCOUNT=ANCOUNT+1
    IF ANCOUNT=16 THEN GOSUB MOVEANIMALS
  END IF
  
  IF SHIELD=0 AND SPRITE HIT(0,2 TO 5) THEN
    SOUND OFF
    SOUND 2, 66, 2, 1
    SOUND 2, 62, 2, 1
    SOUND 2, 68, 3, 1
    WAIT 0.5
    GOTO FAIL
  END IF
  
  IF SHIELD>0 THEN SHIELD=SHIELD-1
  
  TIME=TIME-0.05
  IF OLDTIME<>INT(TIME) THEN GOSUB HUD
  IF TIME<=0 THEN
    SOUND OFF
    T$="TIME OVER"
    COLOR 4
    TEXT 31,28,T$,1
    TEXT 31,30,T$,1
    TEXT 30,29,T$,1
    TEXT 32,29,T$,1
    COLOR 8
    TEXT 31,29,T$,1
    WAIT 1
    GOTO FAIL
  END IF
  
  WAIT 0.05
UNTIL MISSING=0

SOUND OFF
WAIT 0.5
LAYER 1
CLS
SCORE=SCORE+INT(TIME)+LEVEL*10
COLOR 10
FOR X=-1 TO 1
FOR Y=-1 TO 1
TEXT 31+X,18+Y,"LEVEL COMPLETE",1
TEXT 2+X,28+Y,"TIME BONUS"
TEXT 61+X,28+Y,INT(TIME),2
TEXT 2+X,34+Y,"LEVEL BONUS"
TEXT 61+X,34+Y,LEVEL*10,2
TEXT 2+X,44+Y,"NEW SCORE"
TEXT 61+X,44+Y,SCORE,2
NEXT Y
NEXT X
COLOR 1
TEXT 31,18,"LEVEL COMPLETE",1
TEXT 2,28,"TIME BONUS"
TEXT 61,28,INT(TIME),2
TEXT 2,34,"LEVEL BONUS"
TEXT 61,34,LEVEL*10,2
TEXT 2,44,"NEW SCORE"
TEXT 61,44,SCORE,2
WAIT 5 TAP
LEVEL=LEVEL+1
IF CURMAP=NUMMAPS THEN
  CURMAP=1
  NUMANIMALS=NUMANIMALS+1
ELSE
  CURMAP=CURMAP+1
END IF
GOTO LEVELSTART


FAIL:
LIVES=LIVES-1
IF LIVES=0 THEN GOTO GAMEOVER
GOTO LEVELSTART


GAMEOVER:
SPRITE OFF
GAMEPAD 0
SNGMAXVOICE=2
RESTORE GAMEOVERMUSIC
GOSUB READSONG
GOSUB UPDATESONG
RESTORE GAMEOVERPIC
GOSUB SHOWIMAGE
LAYER 1
CLS
WAIT 1
COLOR 4
NEWHS=FALSE
IF SCORE>HISCORE THEN
  HISCORE=SCORE
  NEWHS=TRUE
  SUBMITSCORE SCORE
END IF
TEXT 1,52,"SCORE"
TEXT 1,58,SCORE
TEXT 62,52,"HI",2
TEXT 62,58,HISCORE,2
BL=TRUE
REPEAT
  GOSUB UPDATESONG
  IF BL THEN COLOR 4 ELSE COLOR 5
  IF NEWHS THEN
    TEXT 62,58,HISCORE,2
  ELSE
    TEXT 31,58,"OK",1
  END IF
  BL=NOT BL
  WAIT 0.15 TAP
UNTIL BUTTON(0)
CLS
LAYER 0
GOTO GAMESTART


SHOWIMAGE:
FOR Y=0 TO 63
  FOR X=0 TO 63 STEP 2
    READ BYT
    REM EXTRACT FIRST COLOR FROM BYTE
    COLOR INT(BYT/16)
    PLOT X,Y
    REM EXTRACT SECONDS COLOR WITH BINARY "AND"
    COLOR BYT AND 15
    PLOT X+1,Y
  NEXT X
NEXT Y
RETURN

DRAWMAP:
MISSING=0
FOR TMY=0 TO 7
  FOR TMX=0 TO 7
    TN=MAPS(CURMAP,TMX,TMY)
    IF TN=0 THEN MISSING=MISSING+1
    GOSUB DRAWTILE
  NEXT TMX
NEXT TMY
RETURN

DRAWTILE:
PUT TMX*8,TMY*8,(TN MOD 8)*8,INT(TN/8)*8,8,8
MAP(TMX,TMY)=TN
RETURN

INITPLAYER:
FOR TM=0 TO 7
  IF MAPS(CURMAP,TM,0)=9 THEN
    PLDIR=2
    PLX=TM*8
    PLY=0
    RETURN
  ELSE IF MAPS(CURMAP,TM,7)=9 THEN
    PLDIR=0
    PLX=TM*8
    PLY=7*8
    RETURN
  ELSE IF MAPS(CURMAP,0,TM)=9 THEN
    PLDIR=1
    PLX=0
    PLY=TM*8
    RETURN
  ELSE IF MAPS(CURMAP,7,TM)=9 THEN
    PLDIR=3
    PLX=7*8
    PLY=TM*8
    RETURN
  END IF
NEXT TM
RETURN

INITANIMALS:
PMX=INT(PLX/8)
PMY=INT(PLY/8)
FOR I=0 TO NUMANIMALS-1
  REPEAT
    MX=INT(RND*8)
    MY=INT(RND*8)
    D=INT(RND*4)
    ANIMALS(I)=D
    SPRITE 2+I,MX*8,MY*8,16+D*3
  UNTIL MAP(MX,MY)<10 AND (MX<>PMX OR MY<>PMY)
NEXT I
RETURN

MOVEANIMALS:
ANMOVE=1
ANCOUNT=0
FOR I=0 TO 3
  TMX=INT(SPRITE X(2+I)/8)
  TMY=INT(SPRITE Y(2+I)/8)
  D=INT(RND*4)
  DI=4
  IF D=0 AND TMY>0 THEN
    IF MAP(TMX,TMY-1)<10 THEN DI=0
  ELSE IF D=2 AND TMY<7 THEN
    IF MAP(TMX,TMY+1)<10 THEN DI=2
  ELSE IF D=3 AND TMX>0 THEN
    IF MAP(TMX-1,TMY)<10 THEN DI=3
  ELSE IF D=1 AND TMX<7 THEN
    IF MAP(TMX+1,TMY)<10 THEN DI=1
  END IF
  ANIMALS(I)=DI
NEXT I
SOUND 1,37,3,3
SOUND 1,34,3,3
SOUND 1,30,3,3
RETURN

HUD:
LAYER 1
COLOR 1
BAR 0,0 TO 32,2
IF TIME>0 THEN
  IF TIME<15 THEN COLOR 4 ELSE COLOR 12
  BAR 1,1 TO 1+(TIME+1)/2,1
END IF
LAYER 0
RETURN


INITINSTRUMENTS:
REM ** STANDARDS
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+0,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+1,1
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+2,2
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+3,3
REM ** PULSE WIDTH VARIATIONS
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+4,2,0.25
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+5,2,0.12
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+6,2,0.06
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+7,2,0.2
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+7,1,0,0.8
REM ** DRUMS
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+8,2,0.5,0.1
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+8,0.1,24,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+9,3,0,0.1
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+9,0.1,24,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+10,3,0,0.05
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+11,3,0,0.1
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+11,0.1,-24,0
REM ** BENDED
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+12,0
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+12,0.2,-3,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+13,0
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+13,0.2,3,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+14,1
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+14,0.2,-3,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+15,1
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+15,0.2,3,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+16,2,0.5
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+16,0.2,-3,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+17,2,0.5
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+17,0.2,3,0
REM ** BEND ATTACK
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+18,0
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+18,0.05,12,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+19,1
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+19,0.05,12,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+20,2,0.5
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+20,0.05,12,0
REM *** SFX
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+21,1
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+21,2,24,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+22,3
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+22,2,24,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+23,1
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+23,2,-24,0
DEF SOUND SNGFIRSTINST+24,3
DEF SOUND LINE SNGFIRSTINST+24,2,-24,0
RETURN

READSONG:
REM SNGTEMPO IS UNUSED BUT RESERVED
READ SNGTICKS,SNGTEMPO
FOR SNGR=0 TO 15
  FOR SNGV=0 TO 2
    READ SNGARR(SNGR,SNGV)
  NEXT SNGV
NEXT SNGR
DO
  READ SNGC
  IF SNGC=-1 THEN EXIT
  FOR SNGCR=0 TO 15
    FOR SNGI=0 TO 1
      READ SNGCHA(SNGC,SNGCR,SNGI)
    NEXT SNGI
  NEXT SNGCR
LOOP
DO
  READ SNGP
  IF SNGP=-1 THEN EXIT
  FOR SNGPR=0 TO 15
    FOR SNGI=0 TO 1
      READ SNGPHR(SNGP,SNGPR,SNGI)
    NEXT SNGI
  NEXT SNGPR
LOOP
FOR SNGV=0 TO 2
  SNGPLAYER(SNGV,0)=0
  SNGPLAYER(SNGV,1)=FALSE
NEXT SNGV
SNGROW=0
RETURN

UPDATESONG:
IF NOT SOUND END THEN RETURN
IF SNGROW=16 THEN
  SNGROW=0
ELSE IF SNGARR(SNGROW,0)=255 AND SNGARR(SNGROW,1) AND SNGARR(SNGROW,2)=255 THEN
  SNGROW=0
END IF
FOR SNGV=0 TO SNGMAXVOICE
  SNGC=SNGARR(SNGROW,SNGV)
  IF SNGC=255 THEN
    SOUND SNGV,0,16*SNGTICKS
  ELSE
    SNGCR=SNGPLAYER(SNGV,0)
    SNGP=SNGCHA(SNGC,SNGCR,0)
    IF SNGP=255 THEN
      SOUND SNGV,0,16*SNGTICKS
    ELSE
      SNGT=SNGCHA(SNGC,SNGCR,1)
      SNGCURR=0
      FOR SNGPR=0 TO 16
        IF SNGPR<16 THEN SNGN=SNGPHR(SNGP,SNGPR,0) ELSE SNGN=0
        IF SNGN<255 AND SNGPR>SNGCURR THEN
          SNGN=SNGPHR(SNGP,SNGCURR,0)
          SNGD=(SNGPR-SNGCURR)*SNGTICKS
          IF SNGN=0 OR SNGN=255 THEN
            SOUND SNGV,0,SNGD
          ELSE
            SNGS=SNGFIRSTINST+SNGPHR(SNGP,SNGCURR,1)
            SOUND SNGV,SNGN+SNGT,SNGD,SNGS
          END IF
          SNGCURR=SNGPR
        END IF
      NEXT SNGPR
    END IF
  END IF
NEXT SNGV
SNGRDONE=TRUE
FOR SNGV=0 TO SNGMAXVOICE
  SNGC=SNGARR(SNGROW,SNGV)
  IF SNGC<255 THEN
    SNGCR=SNGPLAYER(SNGV,0)+1
    IF SNGCR<16 THEN SNGP=SNGCHA(SNGC,SNGCR,0) ELSE SNGP=255
    IF SNGP=255 THEN
      SNGCR=0
      SNGPLAYER(SNGV,1)=TRUE
    END IF
    SNGPLAYER(SNGV,0)=SNGCR
    IF NOT SNGPLAYER(SNGV,1) THEN SNGRDONE=FALSE
  END IF
NEXT SNGV
IF SNGRDONE THEN
  SNGROW=SNGROW+1
  FOR SNGV=0 TO 2
    SNGPLAYER(SNGV,0)=0
    SNGPLAYER(SNGV,1)=FALSE
  NEXT SNGV
END IF
RETURN


TITLEPIC:
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,68,75,75,75,68,75,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,84,91,75,75,69,91,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,180,187,68,75,68,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,180,187,69,75,69,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,180,187,75,75,68,75,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,181,187,91,91,85,91,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,187,68,68,187,68,187,180,75,68,187,68,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,180,68,68,75,68,187,180,75,68,75,68,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,180,69,84,75,68,187,180,75,68,75,68,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,181,181,181,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,180,75,180,75,68,187,180,75,68,68,68,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,85,85,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,180,68,68,75,68,180,180,75,68,68,68,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,181,85,85,181,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,180,68,68,75,68,68,68,75,68,84,68,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,181,85,85,85,91,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,180,69,84,75,68,68,68,75,68,180,68,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,85,119,85,91,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,68,68,180,75,180,75,68,69,68,75,68,181,68,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,85,119,119,85,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,68,68,180,75,180,75,68,91,84,75,68,187,68,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,183,87,87,117,187,187,187,187
DATA 181,85,85,181,91,181,91,85,187,181,91,85,187,85,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,183,119,119,123,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,68,187,68,68,187,68,187,180,75,68,68,75,68
DATA 68,75,187,187,178,183,187,187,183,119,119,123,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,68,180,68,180,68,68,75,68,187,180,75,68,68,75,68
DATA 68,68,187,187,34,119,123,187,187,119,103,123,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,68,68,68,180,69,84,75,68,187,180,75,68,85,91,68
DATA 85,68,187,187,35,183,220,187,187,183,119,187,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,68,68,68,180,75,180,75,68,187,180,75,68,68,187,68
DATA 68,68,187,178,34,188,221,203,187,205,221,203,187,187,187,187
DATA 180,69,69,68,180,75,180,75,68,180,180,75,68,68,187,68
DATA 68,69,187,178,51,34,45,220,203,34,221,220,203,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,91,68,180,75,180,75,68,68,68,75,68,85,187,68
DATA 68,91,187,35,187,51,50,34,220,35,39,221,203,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,68,180,75,180,75,68,68,68,75,68,187,34,68
DATA 68,75,187,35,187,187,179,51,50,61,119,124,220,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,68,180,68,68,75,68,69,84,75,68,68,66,68
DATA 84,68,178,59,187,187,187,205,210,61,215,221,204,187,187,187
DATA 180,75,187,68,181,68,68,91,68,91,84,75,68,68,65,68
DATA 21,68,34,59,187,187,187,188,194,61,220,221,220,203,187,187
DATA 181,91,187,85,187,85,85,187,85,187,181,91,85,85,82,85
DATA 33,85,17,43,187,187,187,187,35,205,221,13,221,203,187,187
DATA 180,68,180,68,180,187,180,180,68,187,187,187,187,178,33,17
DATA 18,34,34,17,27,187,187,187,35,205,221,208,221,208,187,187
DATA 180,85,180,84,180,75,68,180,85,187,187,187,187,17,18,34
DATA 33,17,17,35,43,187,187,187,35,205,221,221,13,208,187,187
DATA 180,187,180,180,180,84,84,180,75,187,187,187,187,178,33,17
DATA 18,34,34,17,18,187,187,178,59,205,221,221,208,11,187,187
DATA 180,180,180,68,180,181,180,180,91,187,180,187,187,187,50,34
DATA 33,17,17,35,35,43,187,178,59,188,221,221,208,11,187,187
DATA 180,68,180,84,180,155,180,180,68,187,180,68,187,187,51,51
DATA 50,34,34,17,18,59,187,35,187,188,221,221,208,187,187,187
DATA 181,85,181,181,181,185,181,181,85,43,68,68,68,68,51,51
DATA 51,51,50,35,35,43,187,35,187,188,221,221,208,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,187,34,34,68,68,68,68,68,68
DATA 51,51,48,0,2,59,187,35,187,188,204,204,208,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,187,187,178,17,52,68,68,68,68,68,68
DATA 68,68,48,0,0,43,178,59,187,181,102,102,192,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,185,187,177,17,52,68,68,68,68,68,68
DATA 68,68,68,68,0,187,178,59,187,181,102,102,101,187,187,187
DATA 187,187,187,187,187,185,187,177,18,52,68,68,68,68,68,68
DATA 68,68,68,68,68,75,178,59,187,181,102,102,101,187,187,187
